abstract: In a major victory for JPMorgan Chase, Judge Jed Rakoff dismissed claims by Dexia, a Belgian-French financial institution that had sued the nation’s largest bank over losses on $1.6 billion in 65 residential mortgage investments.
snippet: In a major victory for JPMorgan Chase, Judge Jed Rakoff dismissed claims by Dexia, a Belgian-French financial institution that had sued the nation’s largest bank over losses on $1.6 billion in 65 residential mortgage investments.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge dealt a devastating blow to a lawsuit against JPMorgan Chase that accused the nation’s largest bank and its affiliates of duping investors into buying troubled mortgage-backed securities.

headline.main: In Mortgage Case, Dexia Claims Against JPMorgan Barred
